Package org.objectstyle.cayenne.query

Provides classes to build database queries in object terms.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
GenericSelectQuery A query that returns result set.
ParameterizedQuery Defines a query that can serve as a template for other queries.
Query Defining a generic selecting or updating query that can be executed in Cayenne.
 

Class Summary
AbstractQuery Superclass of Cayenne queries.
BatchQuery BatchQuery and its descendants allow to group similar data for the batch database modifications, including inserts, updates and deletes.
DeleteBatchQuery Batched delete query.
DeleteQuery  
InsertBatchQuery Batched INSERT query.
InsertQuery Describes insert database operation.
Ordering Defines a Comparator for Java Beans.
PrefetchSelectQuery A SelectQuery to perform a prefetch based on another query.
ProcedureQuery A query based on Procedure.
QualifiedQuery An abstract superclass of queries that have qualifiers.
SelectQuery SelectQuery is a Query object describing what rows to retrieve from the database and how to convert them to objects.
SqlModifyQuery Deprecated. Since 1.1 use SQLTemplate.
SqlSelectQuery Deprecated. Since 1.1 use SQLTemplate.
SQLTemplate A generic raw SQL query that can be either a DML/DDL or a select.
UpdateBatchQuery Batched UPDATE query.
UpdateQuery Object encapsulating an UPDATE statement.
 

Package org.objectstyle.cayenne.query Description

Provides classes to build database queries in object terms. Other parts of Cayenne may translate them to the target database SQL syntax.

For more information see Cayenne User Guide.
